This is about building 50 BRAND-NEW scenarios.

I do believe there is a certain role for NPCs: make the scenario more 
challenging by having save the NPC levels and/or provide extra skills 
to your team that may be needed.  If you are going through a wooded 
area, if there was any NPCS, I would expect either an elf or a druid 
who can summon faeries.

Most of the NPCs in the built-in scenarios I consider to be too weak. 
 In 'Tic and Tac' for example, my own team is much stronger 
individually than any of those NPCs.

--- In gladiator@y..., "dancing corpse" <dancing_corpse@h...> wrote:
> some things:
> -get rid of troy and the commander, there always stealing exp from 
my new 
> guys

That's because where they are placed.  I do believe in some NPC to get 
you started.  One of my 1st goals is to acquire my full team as soon 
as possible.  That will take about 3 scenarios to do so if I have a 
large team team (more than 6 members).  The only alternative to that 
is increase the initial amount of gold/silver in the 1st few scenarios 
to help you hire out team.

Specific issues like what to put in a scenario should be discussed 
when/if we start the 50 Project.
